abstract: While some younger arbiters of “what’s cool” have declared MySpace and Facebook passé, the networking-profile sites draw millions of users each month, along with Classmates and Reunion for the over-40 set. Club Penguin, above, is a surprise because it is for younger children like tweens, and it is a subscription-based Web site.

lead_paragraph: While some younger arbiters of “what’s cool” have declared MySpace and Facebook passé, the networking-profile sites draw millions of users each month, along with Classmates and Reunion for the over-40 set. Club Penguin, above, is a surprise because it is for younger children like tweens, and it is a subscription-based Web site.
